name: Roll And Die (Chal)
description:
This game is based on your luck so if your confident enough in your luck then try to beat all the entities that lurks in each levels by spinning the dice!

---Current Levels Available---

-Tutorial

-Level 1: Entity

-More to come soon!

---HOW TO PLAY---

-Press Z to confirm

-Press esc to go back from the previous room you entered

-Press f4 for fullscreen

-Play the tutorial to get the jig of stuff

------------------------

A game i made for the GMTK 2022 game jam Roll Of The Dice
